sentences.en: ...the Caucasus range, an almost impenetrable barrier between Europe and Asia.
sentences.cn: …高加索山脉，欧亚之间一道几乎不可逾越的屏障。
他的书出了名的晦涩难懂。

sentences.en: His dapper self - confidence seemed impenetrable to such hints.
sentences.cn: 这类的暗示似乎动摇不了他坚定的 自信.

sentences.en: I find his style somewhat impenetrable.
sentences.cn: 我发现他的行为方式令人颇为费解.

sentences.en: It was a new experience for me to confront an impenetrable wall.
sentences.cn: 对我来说,面对一堵穿不过的厚墙是一种从未有过的经历.
而且, 物质也是不可入的.

sentences.en: She raised between them a barrier impenetrable as a wall.
sentences.cn: 她就在他们之间垒起一道不能越过的界线,象一堵墙一般.
她是不可动摇的, 不可理解的, 不可捉摸的.

sentences.en: She was the picture of a serene and exquisite but impenetrable sphinx.
sentences.cn: 她看上去就象一尊非常安详精致、但又高深莫测的狮身人面像.

sentences.en: Still, I had also judged the jungle of both banks quite impenetrable.
sentences.cn: 其次, 我先前早已留神了,两岸的丛林异常茂密,一眼看不透.

sentences.en: the impenetrable blackness of the night
sentences.cn: 夜晚伸手不见五指的黑

sentences.en: The language of this document would be impenetrable to anyone except a specialist.
sentences.cn: 除了专家,其他任何人都看不懂这份文件.

sentences.en: The motive for the crime was impenetrable.
sentences.cn: 那起罪行的作案动机叫人捉摸不透.

sentences.en: The trees formed a dark and impenetrable barrier.
sentences.cn: 这些树形成了一道无法通过的黑暗屏障。

sentences.en: The words died under the impenetrable insolence of Bertha's smile.
sentences.cn: 在白莎傲慢的,诡秘的笑容面前这几句话被吞下去了.

sentences.en: Their feathers were like armor impenetrable to steel.
sentences.cn: 它们的羽毛就象刀剑穿不透的盔甲.

sentences.en: Their jargon is impenetrable to an outsider.
sentences.cn: 他们的行话外人听不懂。

words.tran_cn: 不可测知；不能贯穿；不可入性
顽固的人；不知悔改的人

trans.tran_cn: 不能通过的，不能理解的，无动于衷的，顽固的，不接受的
trans.tran_en: If you describe something such as a barrier or a forest as impenetrable, you mean that it is impossible or very difficult to get through
